How to Play

  • Control your player with WASD or mouse
  • Leave your territory to create a trail
  • Return to your territory to capture the enclosed area
  • Hit enemy trails to eliminate them
  • Don't let enemies hit your trail!
  • Collect XP orbs to level up and get more drones
